display_information.name: Nexus Integration
display_information.description: AI-powered Slack integration for Nexus - your work operating system
display_information.long_description:
Nexus Integration allows you to interact with Slack through natural language commands. Send messages, search conversations, manage channels, and automate workflows - all through your AI assistant.

Features:
- Send and schedule messages
- Search messages and files
- Manage channels and DMs
- Add reactions and pins
- Set reminders
- Upload files

This app uses User OAuth, so messages appear as you (not a bot).
